options.name: content_type
options.description:
What type of content you want

Valid Options: ova, ona, show, short, movie, special, music, manga, novel, one_shot

options.name: search_string
options.description: What anime you want to search.

search.description: Searches for anime using the MyAnimelist.net database.

options.name: results
options.description:
Number of anime to be displayed.

Default is 3

options.name: season
options.description:
What season of anime you want.

Default is the current season

Valid Options: winter, spring, summer, fall

options.name: year
options.description:
The year of the anime season.

Default is the current year

seasonal.description: Displays the top 3 seasonal anime from the current season.
